Package nl.infcomtec.ollamajava

Class Request

java.lang.Object
nl.infcomtec.ollamajava.Request
public class Request extends Object
Represents a request to an Ollama model, allowing customization of model parameters and inclusion of system and user prompts. This Java class encapsulates various options that can be adjusted to modify how the model generates its response.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    Integer[]
    context
    Specifies the context tokens for the model to consider when generating a response.
    String
    format
    Specifies the format of the response.
    String[]
    images
    An array of base64-encoded images, for use with multimodal models such as llava.
    String
    keepAlive
    Specifies the time the Ollama service should keep the model loaded.
    String
    model
    The name of the model to use for generating a response.
    Options
    options
    Additional model parameters as documented for the Modelfile, such as temperature and other settings that affect the generation.
    String
    prompt
    The prompt for which the model should generate a response.
    Boolean
    raw
    If true, no formatting will be applied to the prompt, and no context will be returned.
    Boolean
    stream
    If false, the response will be returned as a single response object, rather than a stream of objects.
    String
    suffix
    This is defined in the API spec as "the text after the model response".
    String
    system
    System prompt that overrides what is defined in the Modelfile, used to specify custom behavior of the model.
    String
    template
    The full prompt or prompt template.

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

  • Field Details

    • model

      public String model
      The name of the model to use for generating a response. This field is required.

    • prompt

      public String prompt
      The prompt for which the model should generate a response.

    • format

      public String format
      Specifies the format of the response. Currently, the only supported value is "json".

    • images

      public String[] images
      An array of base64-encoded images, for use with multimodal models such as llava.

    • system

      public String system
      System prompt that overrides what is defined in the Modelfile, used to specify custom behavior of the model.

    • template

      public String template
      The full prompt or prompt template. Overrides what is defined in the Modelfile.

    • raw

      public Boolean raw
      If true, no formatting will be applied to the prompt, and no context will be returned. Use this when specifying a full templated prompt in your request to the API and managing history yourself.

    • stream

      public Boolean stream
      If false, the response will be returned as a single response object, rather than a stream of objects.

    • context

      public Integer[] context
      Specifies the context tokens for the model to consider when generating a response.

    • keepAlive

      public String keepAlive
      Specifies the time the Ollama service should keep the model loaded. Can be specified in minutes (m), seconds (s), or hours (h). The default is 5m. A negative value indicates an infinite keep-alive period.

    • suffix

      public String suffix
      This is defined in the API spec as "the text after the model response".

    • options

      public Options options
      Additional model parameters as documented for the Modelfile, such as temperature and other settings that affect the generation.

  • Constructor Details

    • Request

      public Request()
